thread.section_title: Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent place to stay
thread.title_full: Excellent place to stay - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: NoodleDurban
title: Excellent place to stay
text:
Whether you are in New York for leisure of business this hotel will provide everything you need. The rooms are large and well appointed. The breakfast which is included in the stay is worth every cent and is exceedingly popular with the guests. You are well situated to explore NYC with subways just outside the front door and a brisk walk will get you to Central Park. Great hotel and excellent staff!!
Room Tip: Higher the better but the lifts take a while to get to you. See more room tips
